metadata.title: CVE-2024-26888 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: msft: Fix memory leakFix leaking buffer allocated to send MSFT_OP_LE_MONITOR_ADVERTISEMENT.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
